name: Breaded Parmesan Tilapia
author: Kevin Leebrick
summary: This is the best fish ever! I enjoy serving this with rice and green beans.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place butter and garlic into an 8x8-inch microwave-safe baking pan and microwave until butter is melted, about 30 seconds
Beat eggs together in another bowl
Mix bread crumbs and Parmesan cheese together in a third bowl
Dip fillets in flour until lightly coated, then into beaten eggs, then into bread crumb mixture
Lay in the baking dish with the garlic-butter mixture
Bake in the preheated oven until fish is golden and easily flakes with a fork, about 25 minutes, flipping halfway through cooking time
